title: 60 FPS WOTV on BlueStacks
snippet: After playing 60 FPS WOTV on BlueStacks I don’t want to go back to my mobile device.  I prefer playing on my emulator because of those buttery smooth animations.  I’ve included these steps that have worked for me in hopes that they will work for you as well.How To01. Download BlueStacks 4If you d...
